file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-16-06 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER FUSELAGE III (WING STUB AREA) - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER FUSELAGE III (WING STUB AREA) - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: FOR ACFT EMB-145LR/LU/MR/MP/MK/XR AND EMB-135LR/KE/KL MODELS 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do a detailed visual inspection on the EWIS components at center fuselage III (wing stub area), for general conditions. B. Zones: 155/156/157/531/541/631/641. C. Zone Boundaries (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 and AMM MPP 06-44-00/100). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FOR ACFT EMB-145LR/LU/MR/MP/ EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER MK/XR AND 05-40-16-200-801-A FUSELAGE III (WING TANK UNIT HAR- EMB-135LR/KE/KL NESS) - DETAILED VISUAL INSPECTION MODELS EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-16 Page 1 of 2 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-16-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR ACFT EMB-145LR/LU/MR/MP/MK/XR AND EMB-135LR/KE/KL MODELS 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER FUSELAGE III (WING TANK UNIT HARNESS) - DETAILED VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) AMM TASK 28-41-03-200-801-A/600 gives the procedures to do a detailed visual inspection on the EWIS components of the wing tank unit harness, in center fuselage III and wing LH/RH, for general condition. (2) The content that formerly was in this task has been moved to AMM TASK 28-41-03-200-801-A/600. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 28-41-03-200-801-A/600 TANK-UNIT HARNESS ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Refer to AMM TASK 28-41-03-200-801-A/600. J. EWIS Components in the Center Fuselage III (Wing Tank Unit Harness) - Detailed Visual Inspection SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Refer to AMM TASK 28-41-03-200-801-A/600. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Refer to AMM TASK 28-41-03-200-801-A/600. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-40-16 Page 2 of 2 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
